Hey @LuisaAPF I'm terribly sorry that I'm replying to you only now. The end of the Summer of Code was a busy time for us, and I couldn't find time to go through GH updates until this week.

For non-organizers, it will only be possible to add a new conference from the modal inside the teams/edit form.

It's not entirely correct. We want to let students of accepted teams (= teams which participate in the summer of code) to add new conferences; it doesn't matter how they do it, from their team's page or from the list of conferences.
We do want to restrict access to the users who haven't been accepted to RGSoC, see this comment. Here is an issue to fix this: #840

I listed all possible scenarios on how a new conferences can be added from UI here: #860 (comment) (by students we mean accepted students there). I think it looks good in general, we just need to fix the last redirect and access for the users other than accepted students and orga.

body:
Hey @LuisaAPF I'm terribly sorry that I'm replying to you only now. The end of the Summer of Code was a busy time for us, and I couldn't find time to go through GH updates until this week.

>  For non-organizers, it will only be possible to add a new conference from the modal inside the teams/edit form.

It's not entirely correct. We want to let students of *accepted* teams (= teams which participate in the summer of code) to add new conferences; it doesn't matter how they do it, from their team's page or from the list of conferences. 
We do want to restrict access to the users who haven't been accepted to RGSoC, see [this comment](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/829#issuecomment-324588854). Here is an issue to fix this: #840 

I listed all possible scenarios on how a new conferences can be added from UI here: https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/860#issuecomment-334148668 (by students we mean *accepted* students there). I think it looks good in general, we just need to fix the last redirect and access for the users other than accepted students and orga.
